Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 56th overall pick, by Capital City in 1968...
Injured on 4/6/1968 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 6/23/1970 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Injured on 4/14/1972 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 9/23/1972, off Harry Lust (Ash)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/20/1973, off Frank Brey (PON)...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 3/1/1978 to a minor league contract.
Traded from Plum Grove to Syracuse on 2/5/1979 (Going to SYR: CF C. Sanford, P J. Skeen. Going to PG: SS R. Merz)...
Hit for the cycle against Lynchburg on 8/20/1980...
